statements: SELECT * FROM multi_factor_authentication;
SELECT user_id, username FROM multi_factor_authentication WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT email, phone_number FROM multi_factor_authentication WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM multi_factor_authentication ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM multi_factor_authentication WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM multi_factor_authentication WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM multi_factor_authentication WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, phone_number FROM multi_factor_authentication WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM multi_factor_authentication WHERE email = 'example@email.com' AND password = 'password123';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM multi_factor_authentication ORDER BY username DESC, email ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE id > 100;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM authentication_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, action FROM authentication_log WHERE action = 'login' ORDER BY log_id LIMIT 10;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%john%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT id, timestamp, action FROM authentication_log WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT user_id, username FROM users;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'a%';
SELECT * FROM verification_codes ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT MAX(timestamp) AS last_login, user_id FROM login_attempts GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM login_attempts WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, code, created_at FROM verification_codes WHERE code LIKE '%ABC%';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, password FROM users WHERE password = 'securepassword' OR password = 'strongpassword';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sessions ORDER BY time_created DESC;
SELECT session_id, is_valid FROM sessions WHERE is_valid = true;
SELECT user_id, time_logged FROM authentication_logs WHERE action = 'login';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email = 'example@gmail.com';
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, time_logged, action FROM authentication_logs WHERE success = TRUE ORDER BY time_logged DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sessions WHERE is_valid = TRUE;
SELECT username, email, phone_number FROM users WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%' ORDER BY username;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT security_question FROM security_questions WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, phone_number FROM phone_numbers WHERE phone_number LIKE '123%';
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM login_attempts ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, password_hash FROM users;
SELECT phone_number, user_id FROM phone_numbers WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT security_question, security_answer FROM security_questions WHERE user_id = 2 AND question_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM login_attempts ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, session_token FROM session_tokens WHERE user_id = 3;
